thread.section_title: Real Estate News - Luxury Homes, Property Market and Mortgage Rates - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Inside California’s Golf Paradise For Wealthy Titans

author: Katy McLaughlin
title: Inside California’s Golf Paradise For Wealthy Titans
text:
For roughly a century, moguls, movie stars and heirs have swung golf clubs and soaked in the sea breezes on Pebble Beach, Calif.'s scenic 17-Mile Drive. These days, the large homes that line the Pacific coast and golf courses are still owned by the wealthy, including a significant cohort who are escaping hot weather down south.
Neighbors include Warren Stephens, the chief executive of Stephens Inc., a Little Rock, Ark.-based financial services firm, who paid $31.25 million for a home with golf course and waterfront views...
